item.description:
************************************
UPDATE!
************************************
I just learned that there will be a Forro dance class starting at 9pm!

This should be really fun!

**********************************

There will be a Forro dance night at Ryles with a live ban, JATIR & BANDA - Só Pra Forrozear!

For those who do not know Forro, it is a really fun music/dance from the northeast of Brazil.

For those who want some quality and quieter time to converse in Portuguese, I will ask if you would like to come early, one hour before the music starts. If there is interest, I will arrange an earlier meeting (8pm).

Otherwise, the official start-up time of this Meetup will be 9pm, and bring your comfortable dancing shoes.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Forró at Ryles!
